2164.subject: MAE
2164.descrlong:
Critical Foundations of Curriculum & Instruction: Curriculum History, Philosophy, and Practice including curriculum development and instruction within today's standards-based classrooms.  Must be admitted to the Master of Arts in Education program to enroll in course. (Offered fall and spring semesters as needed. May be offered as classroom-based, hybrid, or online).

(Restricted to MAE Majors and SPED Majors)
